line_1: And ev'ry star that blinks aboon,
line_2: For me, I swear by sun an' moon,

line_1: And ev'ry star that blinks aboon,
line_2: Ye've cost me twenty pair o' shoon

line_1: And ev'ry star that blinks aboon,
line_2: And ev'ry ither pair that's done,

line_1: Gied Forth an' Tay a lift aboon;
Gied Forth an' Tay a lift aboon;
line_2: Yarrow an' Tweed, to monie a tune,

line_1: Gied Forth an' Tay a lift aboon;
line_2: While Irwin, Lugar, Aire an' Doon,

line_1: His heart will never get aboon!
line_2: O, a' ye Bards on bonie DOON!

line_1: His heart will never get aboon!
line_2: An' wha on AIRE your chanters tune!

line_1: His heart will never get aboon!
